title: bia.network
author: bia.network
created_time: August 12, 2022, 10:55:59 AMLast edit: October 14, 2022, 11:03:51 AM by bia.network
content: About HistoryDAOHistoryDAO is where the world records history in Web3. The Web3 community comes together on the HistoryDAO platform to mint historical and current events immutably on the blockchain to be preserved—unchanged and unwavering— as HistoryNFTs. The decentralization and democratization of history with blockchain and NFT technology is governed by you, the DAO, and the people. Write, record, analyze, adjudicate, and mint our world as it unfolds across the globe every day with HistoryDAO and HistoryNFTs. General RulesThe campaign will run for 2 weeks starting, some campaigns have limited participation. New Registrations will not be allowed once the maximum number of participants are reached, so hurry up to avoid missing out!A. Tokens will be distributed to participants within 1 month after the end of the listingCampaign.B. You don't need KYC to participate in this campaign.C.100,000  Tokens will be distributed among the 1000 users with the most stakes afterthe completion of the Bounty program in proportion to the number of points.D. Every participant must join our official TELEGRAM GroupE. Bounty-related questions are not allowed in the group and should be asked in the Bounty chatF. Multi-accounts, bots, spamming, and so on are strictly prohibited, You will be immediately disqualified without notification.G. Our Bounty manager and project team reserve the right to change the terms of the bounty campaign.H. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Proof of Authentication Format:Quote#Proof of AuthenticationForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Discord Username:Twitter Username:Participated Campaigns:campaign allocationsBounty Allocation: 200,000 HAOTwitter                                     [30%]TELEGRAM                               [40%]YouTube                                   [30%]twitter campaginRewards:1. 300 to 1999 followers: 1 stake/week2. 2000 to 4999 followers: 2 stakes/week3. 5000 to 8999 followers: 3 stakes/week4. 9000 to 11999 followers: 4 stakes/week5. >= 12,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules：1- Must follow HistoryDAO's Twitter Page.2- The Twitter account must have 300+ followers.3- Participants must retweet and quote 3 tweets per week (max. 1 retweet/day).4- Participants must tweet 2 original tweet about HistoryDAO per week (Max of 1 per day).5- Participants must use #NFT #HistoryDAO #HistoryNFTs #HAO  hashtags in every retweet or tweet.Join HereHEREhttps://forms.gle/cxgCt2ShFhhhyoEo8SPREADSHEESTS https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1X5jQQ_LBJpShDVNteOb_mziUGEta6_XyXZn4_--lHAo/edit?usp=sharingSubmit your report weekly in this format, don't edit old post.QuoteCode:Week: ####Bitcointalk username:Bitcointalk profile link:Twitter Username:Twitter tweet link:Spreadsheet #:Mint NFT on http://HistoryDAO.IORewards: 10 stakes/weekRules1-Mint NFT on HistoryDAO website2-Post the NFT on Twitter and @History_DAO3-you must choose BSC chain to Mint3-The content of MINT is not limited, as long as it is something you think is worth recording, you can record mint4-Every mint successful one nft gets 2 stakes, and there is a limit of 10 stakes per weekJoin HereHEREhttps://forms.gle/V5UzpdibqgjeFWsQ6SPREADSHEESTS https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1X5jQQ_LBJpShDVNteOb_mziUGEta6_XyXZn4_--lHAo/edit?usp=sharingSubmit your report weekly in this format, don't edit old post.QuoteCode:Week: ####Bitcointalk username:Bitcointalk profile link:Twitter Username:Twitter tweet link:Spreadsheet #:Discord campaginRewards: 5 stakes/weekRules1- Change your Discord name to “Your Name | HistoryDAO".2- Replace your profile picture with HistoryDAO's logo.3- Write at least 5 constructive messages or upgrade to level 3 in other crypto-related Discord groups. You need to write messages like you usually communicate with people in a chat. Your task is to let others see your name with HistoryDAO.4- Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered spam.5- Deleted messages will not be counted.6- You must remain in HistoryDAO group and keep the logo and nickname till the end of the campaign to receive your reward.Join HereHEREhttps://forms.gle/rHNPaWJT4PQuhP7a7SPREADSHEESTS https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1X5jQQ_LBJpShDVNteOb_mziUGEta6_XyXZn4_--lHAo/edit?usp=sharingSubmit your report weekly in this format, don't edit old post.QuoteCode:Week: ####Bitcointalk username:Bitcointalk profile link:Discord id:Discord post link:Spreadsheet #:SugMiner Username:YouTube campaginRewards:1. Average quality: 1 stake2. High quality: 4 stakes3. Premium quality: 10 stakesRules1- Every participant must subscribe to HistoryDAO's Youtube Channel.2- Videos need to be a minimum of 2 minutes in length and must have at least 500 views before the end of the campaign.3- A maximum of 2 videos from one participant will be allowed.4- Video content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, using product operation steps, latest project's token updates, NFT, History,etc.5- You cannot delete video during the campaign, deletion will result in disqualification.6- Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels, or from others' work will be rejected.7- Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. Video created with mobile devices and bot voices will not be rewarded.There will be slim considerations for good quality animation video with bot voices.8- Published videos must have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project website, Twitter page, Discord group, Facebook page, YouTube channel or any other social media.9- By joining this program, you accept that the project's team can use your video(s) as marketing materials.Join HereHEREhttps://forms.gle/PwaDMNfEhxqMcRW69SPREADSHEESTS https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1X5jQQ_LBJpShDVNteOb_mziUGEta6_XyXZn4_--lHAo/edit?usp=sharingSubmit your report weekly in this format, don't edit old post.QuoteCode:Week: ####Bitcointalk username:Bitcointalk profile link:Video link:Spreadsheet #:SugMiner Username:About HistoryDAOHistoryDAO is where the world records history in Web3. Write, record, analyze, adjudicate, and mint our world as it unfolds across the globe every day with HistoryDAO and HistoryNFTs.
